verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thank You for the cross,
The price You paid for us
How You gave Yourself
So completely
Precious Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Now our sins are gone
All forgiven
Covered by Your blood
All forgotten
Thank You, Lord (thank You, Lord)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh, I love You, Lord
Really love You, Lord
I will never understand
Why You love me

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You're my deepest joy
You're my heart's desire
And the greatest thing of all, O Lord, I see
You delight in me!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
For our healing there
Lord, You suffered
And to take our fear
You poured out Your love
Precious Lord

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Calvary's work is done
You have conquered
Able now to save
So completely
Thank You, Lord
Thank You, Lord
